options.name: close
options.description: Mod only: Close the open ticket (Must be used in a support ticket channel)

options.name: open
options.description: Mod only: Open a ticket on another user's behalf

options.name: user
options.description: The user to create the ticket for

options.name: add
options.description: Add a user to the current support ticket

options.name: user
options.description: The user to add to the support ticket

options.name: remove
options.description: Mod only: Remove a user from the current support ticket

options.name: user
options.description: The user to remove from the support ticket
